General.Name: Mercuries Life Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: Mercuries Life Insurance Company Ltd. provides life insurance products primarily in Taiwan. The company offers health, accident, annuities, group, travel, universal, operational loss, and investment-linked insurance products. It operates through branch offices located in Taipei, Taichung, Chiayi, Tainan, and Kaohsiung. Mercuries Life Insurance Company Ltd. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Minquan East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
